Module cincuentazo
Package cincuentazo.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
cincuentazo.model.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the main game logic of "Cincuentazo". Controls players, turns, table sum, and game flow.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the current player whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      current player or null if no active players

    • getActivePlayers

      public List<Player> getActivePlayers()
      Gets all players that are not eliminated.

    • advanceTurn

      public void advanceTurn()
      Advances to the next player's turn.

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(Card card)
      Validates if a card can be played without exceeding 50.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to validate
      Returns:
      true if the card is valid, false otherwise

    • hasValidCards

      public boolean hasValidCards(Player player)
      Checks if a player has any valid cards to play.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check
      Returns:
      true if player has at least one valid card

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Player player, Card card) throws InvalidMoveException
      Plays a card for a player (human or machine). Updates the table sum and removes the card from player's hand.
      Parameters:
      player - the player playing the card
      card - the card to play
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the move is invalid

    • executeMachineTurn

      public Card executeMachineTurn(Player cpu)
      Executes a machine player's turn. Tries to play a valid card, or gets eliminated.
      Parameters:
      cpu - the machine player
      Returns:
      the card played, or null if eliminated

    • executeHumanPlay

      public void executeHumanPlay(Player player, Card card) throws InvalidMoveException
      Attempts to play a card for the human player.
      Parameters:
      player - the human player
      card - the card selected
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the card cannot be played

    • executeHumanDraw

      public void executeHumanDraw(Player player)
      Handles drawing a card for the human player.
      Parameters:
      player - the human player

    • eliminatePlayer

      public void eliminatePlayer(Player player)
      Eliminates a player and returns their cards to the deck.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to eliminate

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      Gets the winner of the game (if any).
      Returns:
      the winning player, or null if no winner yet
